title: Alpha Dragon's Cat
description: Will curiosity kill the cat shifter—or finally cure his lonely heart?Alaric has lost all patience with the Dragonfate Games. After failing to find a mate for four seasons, he suspects foul play. The omega’s convinced a producer has a vendetta against him. He’s perfect, so why hasn’t a bachelor fallen into his paws?When Alaric arrives on the island for season five, he marches to the office of the bastard responsible, the alpha dragon Jade... and stumbles into a world he never imagined.Jade has a dirty little secret. Beneath the civilized surface, he’s depraved and sinful. Yet he never lets the mask slip. He’s too busy running the show to indulge his desires—until an arrogant cat intrudes on his sacred space.Jade punishes him. And Alaric likes it.As they forge a pact of mutual secrecy, Alaric offers Jade reign of his body. But as Jade lavishes Alaric with the tender attention he’s always craved, he suspects his heart might belong to the dragon, too...Alpha Dragon’s Cat is a fun, sweet mpreg novel featuring a sly alpha dragon, a haughty omega cat, and ultra-spicy scenes. Reading the series in order is recommended. No cheating, and fluffy HEA guaranteed!
author: Hawke Oakley
